Translations.Text: Dni pojdem when kazdy soul serve its own zastanca kazdy soul platit fully whatever it robi maly injustice

GOD cites VZOR OBEC POUZIVAT bol ZAISTIT prosperous provisions POJDEM DO it Z everywhere Potom it turned unappreciative z GOD's blessings. Consequently GOD zapricinit them chut hardships z starvation insecurity. Such je requital co they robit
Posol ist them them they zamietnut him. Consequently retribution struck them for ich transgression
Therefore ona jestn GOD's provisions everything bol lawful dobry bol appreciative z GOD's blessings ona kult Him alone
(He len zakazat ona dead zviera blood meat pigs food kto dedicated GOD 1 forced jestn these) without je zamerny zlomyselny potom GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Ona nie utter laicky tvoj own jazyk statny This bol lawful this bol unlawful fabricate laicky attribute them GOD Iste those fabricate laicky attribute them do GOD will never succeed
They enjoy briefly potom suffer painful retribution
Zid my zakazat co my narrated ona previously. Nie bol us zlo them; they bol jeden zlo ich own souls
lenze mat rad zretel those jesen zhresit ignorance potom repent thereafter reform tvoj Lord this robit bol Forgiver Merciful
Abraham je indeed exemplary vanguard jeho submission do GOD monotheist kto never kult idols
he bol appreciative z Jeho Lord's blessings He zvolit si him guided him straight chodnicek
My granted him happiness v this zivot do Hereafter he bol s the righteous
Potom my inspirovat ona (Muhammad) nasledovat nabozenstvo Abraham monotheist; he never bol idol worshiper
Sabbath decreed len those zakoncenie disputing it (Zid Christians)! Tvoj Lord bol Jeden judge them Dni Vzkriesenie ich disputes
Ona invite chodnicek tvoj Lord s wisdom laskavy enlightenment a debate them dobry possible chovanie! Tvoj Lord zauzlit lepsie kto has strayed Jeho chodnicek He zauzlit lepsie kto guided jeden
A if ona punish ona inflict equivalent punishment. Ona vyletne miesto do patience radsej z revenge it je lepsie chory jeden
Ona vyletne miesto patience -Tvoj patience bol attainable len GOD's pomoc. Nie rmutit sa them nie annoyed ich kut plany
GOD bol those lead righteous ZIVOT those bol charitable
